mapper.update:
UPDATE jy_biz_task_send_vehicle_detail
vehicle_status = #{vehicleStatus},
seal_car_time = #{sealCarTime},
come_time = #{comeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
near_come_time = #{nearComeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_erp = #{updateUserErp},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName},
update_time = #{updateTime},
excep_label = #{excepLabel},
task_simple_code = #{taskSimpleCode},
only_load_no_unload = #{onlyLoadNoUnload},
yn = #{yn}
WHERE yn = 1 AND biz_id = #{bizId}

SELECT vehicle_status, COUNT(*) total FROM jy_biz_task_send_vehicle_detail WHERE yn = 1 AND start_site_id = #{startSiteId} AND send_vehicle_biz_id = #{sendVehicleBizId} GROUP BY vehicle_status

FROM jy_biz_task_send_vehicle_detail WHERE yn = 1 AND trans_work_item_code = #{transWorkItemCode} LIMIT 1
